card.name: Abyssal Persecutor
card.text: Flying, trample You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.

card.name: Admonition Angel
card.text: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target nonland permanent other than Admonition Angel. When Admonition Angel leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: AEther Tradewinds
card.text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

card.name: Agadeem Occultist
card.text: {T}: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Akoum Battlesinger
card.text: Haste Whenever Akoum Battlesinger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Amulet of Vigor
card.text: Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield tapped and under your control, untap it.

card.name: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.

card.name: Apex Hawks
Arbor Elf
card.text: {T}: Untap target Forest.

card.name: Archon of Redemption
card.text: Flying Whenever Archon of Redemption or another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's power.

card.name: Avenger of Zendikar
card.text: When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

card.name: Basilisk Collar
card.text: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink. Equip {2}

card.name: Battle Hurda
card.text: First strike

card.name: Bazaar Trader
card.text: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.

card.name: Bestial Menace
card.text: Put a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bloodhusk Ritualist
card.text: Multikicker {B} When Bloodhusk Ritualist enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Bojuka Bog
card.text: Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped. When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target player's graveyard. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Bojuka Brigand
card.text: Bojuka Brigand can't block. Whenever Bojuka Brigand or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bojuka Brigand.

card.name: Brink of Disaster
card.text: Enchant creature or land When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.

card.name: Bull Rush
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Butcher of Malakir
card.text: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Calcite Snapper
card.text: Shroud Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may switch Calcite Snapper's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Canopy Cover
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach. Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

card.name: Caustic Crawler
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Celestial Colonnade
card.text: Celestial Colonnade enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. {3}{W}{U}: Until end of turn, Celestial Colonnade becomes a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying and vigilance. It's still a land.

card.name: Chain Reaction
card.text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

card.name: Claws of Valakut
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.

card.name: Comet Storm
card.text: Multikicker {1} Choose target creature or player, then choose another target creature or player for each time Comet Storm was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

card.name: Corrupted Zendikon
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 3/3 black Ooze creature. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cosi's Ravager
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Creeping Tar Pit
card.text: Creeping Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. {1}{U}{B}: Creeping Tar Pit becomes a 3/2 blue and black Elemental creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Crusher Zendikon
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 4/2 red Beast creature with trample. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cunning Sparkmage
card.text: Haste {T}: Cunning Sparkmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Dead Reckoning
card.text: You may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. If you do, Dead Reckoning deals damage equal to that card's power to target creature.

card.name: Deathforge Shaman
card.text: Multikicker {R} When Deathforge Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to twice the number of times it was kicked.

card.name: Death's Shadow
card.text: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

card.name: Dispel
card.text: Counter target instant spell.

card.name: Dragonmaster Outcast
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Dread Statuary
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}: Dread Statuary becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Enclave Elite
Everflowing Chalice
Explore
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Eye of Ugin
card.text: Colorless Eldrazi spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. {7}, {T}: Search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Feral Contest
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Another target creature blocks it this turn if able.

card.name: Fledgling Griffin
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Fledgling Griffin gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Gnarlid Pack
card.text: Multikicker {1}{G} Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Graypelt Hunter
card.text: Trample Whenever Graypelt Hunter or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Graypelt Hunter.

card.name: Grotag Thrasher
card.text: Whenever Grotag Thrasher attacks, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Groundswell
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Landfall - If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Guardian Zendikon
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 2/6 white Wall creature with defender. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Hada Freeblade
card.text: Whenever Hada Freeblade or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hada Freeblade.

card.name: Halimar Depths
card.text: Halimar Depths enters the battlefield tapped. When Halimar Depths enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Halimar Excavator
card.text: Whenever Halimar Excavator or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Hammer of Ruin
Harabaz Druid
card.text: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Hedron Rover
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hedron Rover gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Horizon Drake
card.text: Flying, protection from lands

card.name: Iona's Judgment
card.text: Exile target creature or enchantment.

card.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
card.text: +2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. 0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order. -1: Return target creature to its owner's hand. -12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

card.name: Join the Ranks
card.text: Put two 1/1 white Soldier Ally creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Joraga Warcaller
Jwari Shapeshifter
card.text: You may have Jwari Shapeshifter enter the battlefield as a copy of any Ally creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Kalastria Highborn
card.text: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Kazuul, Tyrant of the Cliffs
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, if you're the defending player, put a 3/3 red Ogre creature token onto the battlefield unless that creature's controller pays {3}.

card.name: Khalni Garden
card.text: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Kitesail
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying. Equip {2}

card.name: Kitesail Apprentice
card.text: As long as Kitesail Apprentice is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Kor Firewalker
card.text: Protection from red Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Lavaclaw Reaches
card.text: Lavaclaw Reaches enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. {1}{B}{R}: Until end of turn, Lavaclaw Reaches becomes a 2/2 black and red Elemental creature with "{X}: This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn." It's still a land.

card.name: Lightkeeper of Emeria
Loam Lion
card.text: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Lodestone Golem
card.text: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Marshal's Anthem
Mire's Toll
card.text: Target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

card.name: Mordant Dragon
card.text: Flying {1}{R}: Mordant Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Mordant Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal that much damage to target creature that player controls.

card.name: Mysteries of the Deep
card.text: Draw two cards. Landfall - If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.

card.name: Nature's Claim
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

card.name: Nemesis Trap
card.text: If a white creature is attacking, you may pay {B}{B} rather than pay Nemesis Trap's mana cost. Exile target attacking creature. Put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Novablast Wurm
card.text: Whenever Novablast Wurm attacks, destroy all other creatures.

card.name: Omnath, Locus of Mana
card.text: Green mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end. Omnath, Locus of Mana gets +1/+1 for each green mana in your mana pool.

card.name: Perimeter Captain
card.text: Defender Whenever a creature you control with defender blocks, you may gain 2 life.

card.name: Permafrost Trap
card.text: If an opponent had a green creature enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay Permafrost Trap's mana cost. Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Pilgrim's Eye
card.text: Flying When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Pulse Tracker
card.text: Whenever Pulse Tracker attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Quag Vampires
Quest for Renewal
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, you may put a quest counter on Quest for Renewal. As long as there are four or more quest counters on Quest for Renewal, untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

card.name: Quest for the Goblin Lord
card.text: Whenever a Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Goblin Lord. As long as Quest for the Goblin Lord has five or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Quest for the Nihil Stone
card.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Nihil Stone. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand and Quest for the Nihil Stone has two or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 5 life.

card.name: Quest for Ula's Temple
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put a quest counter on Quest for Ula's Temple. At the beginning of each end step, if there are three or more quest counters on Quest for Ula's Temple, you may put a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Quicksand
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Raging Ravine
card.text: Raging Ravine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. {2}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Raging Ravine becomes a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." It's still a land.

card.name: Razor Boomerang
card.text: Equipped creature has "{T}, Unattach Razor Boomerang: Razor Boomerang deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Return Razor Boomerang to its owner's hand." Equip {2}

card.name: Refraction Trap
card.text: If an opponent cast a red instant or sorcery spell this turn, you may pay {W} rather than pay Refraction Trap's mana cost. Prevent the next 3 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Refraction Trap deals that much damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Rest for the Weary
card.text: Target player gains 4 life. Landfall - If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that player gains 8 life instead.

card.name: Ricochet Trap
card.text: If an opponent cast a blue spell this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay Ricochet Trap's mana cost. Change the target of target spell with a single target.

card.name: Roiling Terrain
card.text: Destroy target land, then Roiling Terrain deals damage to that land's controller equal to the number of land cards in that player's graveyard.

card.name: Ruin Ghost
card.text: {W}, {T}: Exile target land you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Rumbling Aftershocks
card.text: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, you may have Rumbling Aftershocks deal damage to target creature or player equal to the number of times that spell was kicked.

card.name: Ruthless Cullblade
card.text: Ruthless Cullblade gets +2/+1 as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.

card.name: Scrib Nibblers
card.text: {T}: Exile the top card of target player's library. If it's a land card, you gain 1 life. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Scrib Nibblers.

card.name: Searing Blaze
card.text: Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature that player controls. Landfall - If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player and 3 damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Seer's Sundial
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Sejiri Merfolk
card.text: As long as you control a Plains, Sejiri Merfolk has first strike and lifelink.

card.name: Sejiri Steppe
card.text: Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Selective Memory
card.text: Search your library for any number of nonland cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Shoreline Salvager
card.text: Whenever Shoreline Salvager deals combat damage to a player, if you control an Island, you may draw a card.

card.name: Skitter of Lizards
Slavering Nulls
card.text: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.

card.name: Slingbow Trap
card.text: If a black creature with flying is attacking, you may pay {G} rather than pay Slingbow Trap's mana cost. Destroy target attacking creature with flying.

card.name: Smoldering Spires
card.text: Smoldering Spires enters the battlefield tapped. When Smoldering Spires enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Smother
card.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Snapping Creeper
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Creeper gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Spell Contortion
card.text: Multikicker {1}{U} Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Draw a card for each time Spell Contortion was kicked.

card.name: Stirring Wildwood
card.text: Stirring Wildwood enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. {1}{G}{W}: Until end of turn, Stirring Wildwood becomes a 3/4 green and white Elemental creature with reach. It's still a land.

card.name: Stone Idol Trap
card.text: Stone Idol Trap costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature. Put a 6/12 colorless Construct artifact creature token with trample onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Stoneforge Mystic
card.text: When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Strength of the Tajuru
card.text: Multikicker {1} Choose target creature, then choose another target creature for each time Strength of the Tajuru was kicked. Put X +1/+1 counters on each of them.

card.name: Summit Apes
card.text: As long as you control a Mountain, Summit Apes can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Surrakar Banisher
card.text: When Surrakar Banisher enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Talus Paladin
card.text: Whenever Talus Paladin or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Allies you control gain lifelink until end of turn, and you may put a +1/+1 counter on Talus Paladin.

card.name: Tectonic Edge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Tectonic Edge: Destroy target nonbasic land. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls four or more lands.

card.name: Terastodon
card.text: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller puts a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Terra Eternal
card.text: All lands have indestructible.

card.name: Thada Adel, Acquisitor
card.text: Islandwalk Whenever Thada Adel, Acquisitor deals combat damage to a player, search that player's library for an artifact card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Tideforce Elemental
card.text: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap another target creature. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Tideforce Elemental.

card.name: Tomb Hex
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Landfall - If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Treasure Hunt
card.text: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.

card.name: Tuktuk Scrapper
card.text: Whenever Tuktuk Scrapper or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact. If that artifact is put into a graveyard this way, Tuktuk Scrapper deals damage to that artifact's controller equal to the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Twitch
card.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card.

card.name: Urge to Feed
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

card.name: Vapor Snare
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vapor Snare unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vastwood Animist
card.text: {T}: Target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature until end of turn, where X is the number of Allies you control. It's still a land.

card.name: Vastwood Zendikon
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 6/4 green Elemental creature. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Veteran's Reflexes
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

card.name: Voyager Drake
Walking Atlas
card.text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Wind Zendikon
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wolfbriar Elemental
card.text: Multikicker {G} When Wolfbriar Elemental enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Wrexial, the Risen Deep
card.text: Islandwalk, swampwalk Whenever Wrexial, the Risen Deep deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.
